Text: The Type 5 medium tank Chi-Ri (五式中戦車 チリ , Go-shiki chusensha Chi-ri ) ("Imperial Year 2605 Medium Tank Model 9") was the ultimate medium tank developed by the Imperial Japanese Army in World War II.
Triplets:<The Type 5 medium tank Chi-Ri

Text: Type 5 Chi-Ri:  A single prototype was incomplete when the war ended.
